attach().Description: Attach the helper to the view. This will replace previously existing touch and long click listeners.

Parameters: View: The view that was clicked and held.

Parameters: Point: The position of the touch event that started the drag operation.

ClassDesc: DragStartHelper is a utility class for implementing drag and drop support. It detects gestures commonly used to start drag (long click for any input source, click and drag for mouse). It also keeps track of the screen location where the drag started, and helps determining the hot spot position for a drag shadow.
